EnhancedContent:
Thank you for your interest in the new Azure SDKs! We release new features, improvements, and bug fixes every month. Subscribe to our [Azure SDK Blog RSS Feed](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/azure-sdk/feed/) to get notified when a new release is available.

You can find links to packages, code, and docs on our [Azure SDK Releases page](https://aka.ms/azsdk/releases).

## Release highlights

### AI Foundry `1.2.0-beta.1`
for [.NET](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Azure.AI.Projects/1.2.0-beta.1)

This major update brings feature support for Microsoft Foundry Agents Service, integration with the new `Azure.AI.Projects.OpenAI` package, expanded evaluation capabilities, insights, red teaming, schedules, and more. It’s a significant expansion of AI capabilities for .NET developers working with Azure AI services.

### Azure AI Search `11.8.0-beta.1`
for [.NET](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Azure.Search.Documents/11.8.0-beta.1)

This release adds support for the `2025-11-01-preview` service version with many new features including multiple facet aggregation types (`avg` , `min` , `max` , `cardinality` ), new knowledge source types (`web` , `remoteSharePoint` , `indexedSharePoint` , `indexedOneLake` ), and support for new Azure OpenAI models (`gpt-5` , `gpt-5-mini` , `gpt-5-nano` ). Note that this release includes breaking changes where Knowledge Agent has been renamed to Knowledge Base across all APIs and models.

### Functions Extension for WebPubSub for SocketIO `1.0.0`
for [.NET](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.WebPubSubForSocketIO/1.0.0)

The stable release of the Azure Functions extension for Web PubSub for SocketIO has shipped. This library enables developers to build real-time, bidirectional communication applications using the familiar Socket.IO programming model with Azure Web PubSub as the backend.

### Initial stable releases

- **Client Library for .NET**
- [Functions extension for Web PubSub for SocketIO 1.0.0](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.WebPubSubForSocketIO/1.0.0)
- **Management Libraries for .NET**
- [Resource Management – Storage Discovery 1.0.0](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Azure.ResourceManager.StorageDiscovery/1.0.0)
- [Resource Management – Mongo Cluster 1.0.0](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Azure.ResourceManager.MongoCluster/1.0.0)
- [Resource Management – Durable Task 1.0.0](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Azure.ResourceManager.DurableTask/1.0.0)
- **Management Library for Go**
- [Resource Management – Deployment 1.0.0](https://pkg.go.dev/github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-go/sdk/resourcemanager/resources/armdeployments)

### Initial beta releases

- **Client Libraries for .NET**
- [Provisioning – Front Door 1.0.0-beta.1](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Azure.Provisioning.FrontDoor/1.0.0-beta.1)
- [Provisioning – DNS 1.0.0-beta.1](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Azure.Provisioning.Dns/1.0.0-beta.1)
- [Azure.AI.AgentServer.Contracts 1.0.0-beta.1](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Azure.AI.AgentServer.Contracts/1.0.0-beta.1)
- [Azure.AI.AgentServer.Core 1.0.0-beta.1](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Azure.AI.AgentServer.Core/1.0.0-beta.1)
- [Azure.AI.AgentServer.AgentFramework 1.0.0-beta.1](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Azure.AI.AgentServer.AgentFramework/1.0.0-beta.1)
- **Management Library for .NET**
- [Resource Management – Impact Reporting 1.0.0-beta.1](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Azure.ResourceManager.ImpactReporting/1.0.0-beta.1)
- **Client Libraries for Java**
- [azure-ai-voicelive 1.0.0-beta.1](https://central.sonatype.com/artifact/com.azure/azure-ai-voicelive/1.0.0-beta.1)
- [azure-ai-agents 1.0.0-beta.1](https://central.sonatype.com/artifact/com.azure/azure-ai-agents/1.0.0-beta.1)
- **Client Libraries for Python**
- [azure-confidentialledger-certificate 1.0.0b1](https://pypi.org/project/azure-confidentialledger-certificate/1.0.0b1/)
- [azure-planetarycomputer 1.0.0b1](https://pypi.org/project/azure-planetarycomputer/1.0.0b1/)
- [azure-ai-agentserver-core 1.0.0b1](https://pypi.org/project/azure-ai-agentserver-core/1.0.0b1/)
- **Management Library for Python**
- [Resource Management – Recoveryservicesbackup-Passivestamp 1.0.0b1](https://pypi.org/project/azure-mgmt-recoveryservicesbackup-passivestamp/1.0.0b1/)

## Release notes

- [All languages](https://azure.github.io/azure-sdk/releases/2026-01/index.html)
- [.NET](https://azure.github.io/azure-sdk/releases/2026-01/dotnet.html)
- [JavaScript/TypeScript](https://azure.github.io/azure-sdk/releases/2026-01/js.html)
- [Python](https://azure.github.io/azure-sdk/releases/2026-01/python.html)
- [Go](https://azure.github.io/azure-sdk/releases/2026-01/go.html)

- [iOS](https://azure.github.io/azure-sdk/releases/2026-01/ios.html)
Author: Ronnie Geraghty
Title: Azure SDK Release (January 2026)
Description:
Azure SDK releases every month. In this post, you'll find this month's highlights and release notes.

The post [Azure SDK Release (January 2026)](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/azure-sdk/azure-sdk-release-january-2026/) appeared first on [Azure SDK Blog](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/azure-sdk).
